metadata.description: In order to win a legendary haunted guitar, Emily is determined to create the most rockin' song the world has ever known . . . but can she do it solo? Emily isn't known for playing well with others, but she's going to have to rely on the help of some Strangers if she's going to succeed on her musical journey to the true heart of rock 'n' roll! Collects the three issue miniseries.
metadata.name: Emily and the Strangers
